data.actual_result: Layout bound size is not consistent and creates a larger gap between the badge left to it
data.expected_result: Nitro badge's layout bound should be the same size as all the other badges
data.short_description: Layout bound for Nitro badge larger than normal in build 8.0.4, creating inconsistent spacing between other badges left from it
data.steps_to_repro: - Update to 8.0.4 - Head over to somebody's profile with multiple badges, including Nitro  - Observe the spacing
